articles.title: Solar storms and asteroids gave Mercury a comet-like tail; Can the same happen to Earth? - HT Tech
articles.description: A recent view of the Mercury displayed a yellow-orange tail, giving it an appearance of a comet. It turns out this happened due to bombardment by solar storms and asteroids. But can it also happen to the Earth?
articles.content: It turns out, the Earth is not the only planet to be assaulted by incessant solar storm disturbances. The planet closest to the Sun, Mercury, is also being bombarded by solar storms on a regular basi… [+2102 chars]
